title: PM consoles death of Begum Ghulam Safdar Khan Leghari
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday offered his heartfelt condolences to PML-N leaders Sardar Azhar Khan Leghari and Arshad Khan Leghari on their motherâ€™s death.
Sympathizing with the whole Leghari family on the demise of Begum Ghulam Safdar Khan Leghari, the prime minister said it was very sad to lose a compassionate and caring personality like mother.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to elevate the ranks of the departed soul in Jannah.
He also prayed for the grant of courage to the bereaved family members to bear the loss with fortitude.
